From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

yep, I'm fighting against druids.  Give them a wide area, you'll find 
it hard to walk around in a few minutes.  One thing puzzles me, 
though.  Why doesn't bombs from a thief destroy nearby enemy trees?  
Poison clouds have no effect on trees, thus leaving only the basic 
attack to clear your path.

My only regrets is I wish I had an attack that would just take out 
faeries, trees, and those damn waves of protection the druid casts.  
Hmm.  I might give the druids level 500 potions of invulnverability.  
Wait a minute.  that might leave them stuck in a poison cloud.
